card.mouse-desc: A common sewer mouse. Worth 1 height point.
card.spider-desc: Make the opponent skip his turn. Worth 1 height point.
card.knight-desc: Collect all 4 of them to win instantly. Worth 1 height point.

obj_game.deception-instruction:
Scan the QR Code with your phone
to discover your [#b07994]DECEPTION[#cccccc]
Or click the QR Code if you're away from prying eyes

tricks.sweet: Treat: no deception for you in this game.
tricks.mouse:
Proliferation: if you collect all the mouse
cards in your tower, you gain a +3 height bonus.
tricks.short-tower: Small Barrel: you win if you have the lowest tower.
tricks.ghost: Spiritual Session: ghosts are worth 1 in height.
